coded_answer.p: I received your letter, which says I won the first prize in your competition - two weeks at Camp California in the U.S.A. I apreicateappreciate itthat and I thank you a lotsincerely that youfor havehaving chosen me as a winner. I acxeptedacceptedaccept it and I want to inform you that I can travel only onin July because I have booked my anualannual leave for that period. Also, I prefer to stay in tents because I have memories from my childhood. Every yearsyear my parents used to sentsend me for holidays atto Camps onin the mountains so I would like to stay for a while in the same type of accommodation, and environment. Also, I prefer swimming and painting. I started to learn how to swim when I was 7 years old. My parents broughttook me to the sea sideseaside every weekend so I wasgot used to bebeing insidein the water all the seasons. I have taken part in races twice in my life, where I was successful. Also, I likehave liked painting from an youngearly age, and I have taken part in a public exhibition, where I won the first prize. I would like to ask how much money I should have with me, and where can I keep themit? What about the clothes, you? You don't mention anything about them. Do I need something special or can I wear ordinary clothes?
I would like to write about mythe experience that I had, when I enjoyed helping at a pop concert in my neighbourhood.

I am a member inof the council team so I decided to help them at a pop concert that was organized in the last month. I helped them to prepare the room for the badsbands and I decorated the place for the singers. Also, I assistedhelped them to choose the right instruments and to test them. It took a long time to testifitetest the speakers and the microphones. UnlessApart from this preparation, I also took parthelped out toduring the concert. I helped them to the music and to the songs. It was a quitequite a difficult assimentassignmentjob but I got some very good experience. I understoodrealised it when the concert had finished. The audientsaudience was excited and I cannot discribedescribe my happynesshappiness. It was some thingsomething that I didn't expect. Also, it happenhappenedwas the first time in my life. I still have the sound of the music in my ears and the voices of the young people who were accompaningaccompanying our songs. I enjoyed it very much and I want to tranferetransferconvey my enjoymentpleasure to you thoughthrough this letter.
